nodes.text: During the Siege of Lasan, a male Lasat served in the Lasan High Honor Guard. He owned a J-19 bo-rifle. During the Siege, he fought Imperial Security Bureau Agent Alexsandr Kallus, and was defeated by him. Following the Lasat tradition of Boosahn Keeraw, he gave Kallus the bo-rifle before dying, as he had been bested by a superior opponent.

The Honor Guard is first mentioned in the Star Wars Rebels first season episode "Droids in Distress". He is mentioned again in the season 2 episode "The Honorable Ones", where more is learned about the exact circumstances under which Kallus fought him.
